cRefPattern.p: This pattern references a specific line.
This pattern references an inscribed surface on an object.

div.l: gidlam-zu? galla gal an-ki-a ni2? gal dingir-re-e-ne im#?-x-x
u4 sumur huš uru2-gin7 zi-ga-bi nu-še-ga a2 nig2-x x x-dab5?-be2

šu gal5-la2-bi mu-da-[...] x x tum2-mu-zu [...] x ki ag2
